definition: (of a gable or spire) furnished with a crocket (an ornament in the form of curved or bent foliage)
details:
adjective
- (of a gable or spire) furnished with a crocket (an ornament in the form of curved or bent foliage)
= example: (of a gable or spire) furnished with a crocket (an ornament in the form of curved or bent foliage)
